title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.325 - Trade discount
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.325 - Trade discount

State Regulations

The discount allowed to a class of customers on a list
price before consideration of credit terms; as a rule, invoice prices are
recorded in the books of account net after the deduction of trade discounts. Trade discounts are not to be confused with cash or purchase discounts which
are other operating revenues. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.325

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
